alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 3:23PM CDT until April 15 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 323 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marble, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Green Forest... Carrollton... Rudd... Marble... Forum... Osage... Urbanette... Rule... Rockhouse... Dryfork... Cabanal... Metalton... Connor... Coin... Alabam... Delmar... Denver... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
